name: Thrust Xtreme
description:
Pilot your ship down to each planet surface, collect fuel and defeat the Empire's defences.

Find the Klystron pod, attach it to your ship and move back into space. Leaving a planet without the pod will send you back to the same world.

After completing the game you will restart with gravity reversed. Finishing the game again will restart you facing invisible worlds. Expect a combination of those two after defeating the game again. After that? You'll be a legend. Send me a screenshot of your accomplishment!

You can use the editors to create your own worlds! Feel free to send worlds to me, so I can offer them to everyone from the website for download.

Use the readme file in the archive for instructions.
